name: 1st ANDRAGOGY & ADULT EDUCATION CONFERENCE
content: 1st ANDRAGOGY & ADULT EDUCATION CONFERENCE psychological, sociological, economic and cultural dimensions of development 2019 University of Wrocław and Foundation Pro Scientia Publica are pleased to announce the 1st international conference ANDRAGOGY & ADULT EDUCATION. Psychological, sociological, economic and cultural dimensions of development The conference will take place on the 11-13 September 2019 at the University of Wrocław, Poland. The main topics are contemporary problems of andragogy and adult education related to the cultural, economic and social change. We especially invite transdisciplinary and interdisciplinary young scholars, trainers, coaches, tutors and practicioners as one of our aims is to avoid the sometimes unclear divisions between different branches and disciplines as well as to promote knowledge above all boundaries. Application form: goo.gl/nGgWFD
organizers: University of Wroclaw, Foundation Pro Scientia Publica
